arena

Class BotInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • arena.BotInfo

  • public class BotInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class exists to hold all the important info about a Bot in one place. When Bots are asked for their next move, they get two arrays of BotInfo - one for live Bots and one for dead Bots. No information here is modifiable from outside the arena package, and only the public information about the bots is accessible outside the arena package.
